headline: Bloom Energy Stock Is an AI Darling. Why Investors Should Sell Anyway.
summary: Investors have plenty of reasons to be excited about  Bloom Energy  stock, which has surged more than 540% over the last 12 months.  The firm downgraded Bloom to Underperform from Hold and lifted its price target to $31 from $24 in a research note Wednesday, arguing that the stock’s rapid ascent is a case of “euphoria over fundamentals.”  Data centers’ insatiable need for power has fueled Bloom’s rise.
